projects.name: Desktop E-Commerce
projects.despcription: This is a fully functional eCommerce. Half of the project is imported from JavaScript into HTML. I used HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript.

projects.name: To Do List
projects.despcription: To create this fully functional To-Do List, I had to learn the CRUD system, and I am satisfied with it. I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create it.

projects.name: Temperature Convertor
projects.despcription: This is a fully functional Temperature Converter. It can convert Celsius to Fahrenheit and vice versa. It was made using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.name: BMI Calculator
projects.despcription: This is a fully functional BMI calculator. I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create it. This project is where I learned how to import JavaScript into HTML.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.despcription: This calculator is fully functional. It uses onclick, functions and queryselectorAll for the first time. It was made using HTML, CSS & Javascript.

projects.name: Web Porfolio
projects.despcription: My first full website. I added animations on my buttons and used a modal from bootstrap. I used HTML, CSS & Bootstrap to create this Portfolio.

testimonils.name: Keeno Fourie
testimonils.testimonial: Codi is the most friendly and kind-hearted person I know. He is committed to what he does, and his determination is unmatched when it comes to solving a problem.

testimonils.name: Joel Mukanya
testimonils.testimonial: Codi is very well-behaved, social, and dedicated; he enjoys working with his peers and works well on his project. He learned HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and VueJS.

testimonils.name: Uzukhanye Dywili
testimonils.testimonial: Working with Codi was an incredible experience. Their professionalism, attention to detail, and communication skills made the entire process seamless.

testimonils.name: Taflynne Petersen
testimonils.testimonial: Codi is a smart person who enjoys coding and knows what he is doing. He is able to figure out errors quickly and is determined in his career in web development.

testimonils.name: Timothy Barry
testimonils.testimonial: Codi, what a guy. There is so much to say about him. He is a very kind person and also very genuine. He has excellent skills in HTML and CSS, and he excels at everything he does.

testimonils.name: Cheslyn Herman
testimonils.testimonial: My time working alongside Codi has been impressive. He is an incredibly hardworking individual who ensures that his objectives are always met, no matter how difficult the task.
